title: Adobe Premiere Pro CC 2015 (v9.0) RUS-ENG by M0nkrus-=TEAM OS=-
description:

assembly Author : m0nkrus

System requirements:
- Processor Intel Core 2 or AMD Phenom II; requires support for 64-bit architecture
- 64-bit version of Microsoft Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8 or Windows 8.1
- 4 GB of RAM (8 GB recommended)
- 4 GB of free hard disk space for installation. During installation, additional free space required
- Requires additional disk space for files, providing a preview, and other working files (10GB recommended)
- Display with a resolution of 1280x800
- Hard disk with a speed of at least 7200 rev / min (preferably a few fast hard drives, preferably RAID 0)
- Sound card compatible with ASIO protocol or Microsoft Windows Driver Model
- To use QuickTime features require installation of QuickTime 7.6.6
- Optional: Adobe-certified GPU hardware acceleration
- To access the web services required Internet connection and registration

Description: Adobe Premiere Pro in 2015 - is a powerful, highly customizable editor for non-linear editing, with which you can mount the video exactly as you want it.
Import and free association any video from the clip, filmed on the phone, to the raw 5K, followed by the installation, which does not need to perform transcoding.
Perform video editing faster with Adobe Premiere Pro CC 2015 - the perfect tool for professional editors. Now available a variety of new features,
including a built-in color correction with Adobe SpeedGrade CC 2015, extended support of the original formats, improved the function of mounting material with multiple cameras, and so on.
D. Adobe Premiere Pro CC 2015 is part of the Creative Cloud. Therefore, its users access to all the latest updates, and access to new versions available from the date of their issue.
Improve your skills and master new tools thanks to the large and ever-growing collection of instructional videos. Through integration with Behance can share their projects with other users and receive instant feedback on their work from designers from around the world.
